body.name: Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner with 11-Piece Accessory Set, Multi-Surface Steamer for Cleaning, All Natural Steam Cleaner for Home, Upholstery, Car, Floor, Grout and Tile
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 11 hrs 52 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Powerful Steamer for Cleaning】The high-pressure steam with 3BAR equivalent to 3KG of pressure can spray 3.9ft(1.2m), so our steam cleaner is more than enough to blow away oil, dust and stains.

【Hot Steamer for Cleaning】Our 1200 watts steam cleaners for home use can heat up fast in 3-5 minutes. The steam cleaner for car can continuously emit pressurized 230℉(110℃) hot steam for up to 8-12 minutes! You can use MOSCHE steam cleaner for car to cut through any grease, grout and tile.

【Multiple Surface Steam Cleaner】Our handheld pressurized steam cleaner is best suited for hard to reach areas, windows, floor gap, grout and tile, fabric & sofa material, kids toy, sinks, stoves, BBQ grill, toilet, shower curtains, car seats & rims, wallpaper and more.

【11 Accessories Set Steam Cleaner】Our powerful steam cleaner for home includes an exclusive free 11 pieces accessory kit. This all in one steamer for cleaning includes 3 Nylon Brush and other attachments. You can choose the accessories you need to clean your hard to reach areas.

【All Natural & Chemical Free Steam Cleaner】The safe and reliable steam cleaner for home naturally using only water without chemical so it do nothing harmful. Pretty safe for the family who with kids and pets at home.

【Portable & Handheld Steamer for Cleaning】 This handheld design make our steam cleaner easily to carry from room to room. 9.8ft(3m) cord also allows for greater flexibility when cleaning your house anywhere.

【Tips】If you can not open the cap after use, that is because the temperature of the residual steam indide the tank is still too high. Please: 1.Unplug first 2. Fully discharge the residual steam or wait the steam cool down. 3. Open the lid and add water into the steam cleaner.

【Tips 2】Please wait the first heating completely finish to use the steam cleaner. Because it can spray steam when it is not sufficiently heating, but it will be mixed with water when using. After a short time use, it is normal that the steam cleaner can not heat because the internal temperature is reach to 138 ℃, at this time the temperature control will be protected. If there is no temperature control and infinite heating, the machine will burn internal components because of high temperature.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: for your daily cleaning Handheld & Portable Steam cleaner Portable & Handheld Steam Cleaner, All Natural & Chemical Free, 230℉(115℃) Hot Pressurized Steam, Fast Heating Steam Cleaner handheld for home and furniture.
This steam cleaner is No-Chemical designed so it is safe for pets, child & pernant. Our Steam Cleaner for home car is a good helper for your daily cleaning.

Steamer for cleaning attach with Nylon Brushes can clean kitchen sink, oven, cup holder, upholstery, sofa, car seat, shower tub, carpet, grout, shoes, bathroom gap, bathroom tiles & other places. This steam cleaner handheld attach with Long Spray Nozzle can be used to clean jewelry, messes, golf clubs, gum, ceiling fans, tight crevices, narrow spaces, wallpaper removal and dog dirty placees. MOSCHE steam cleaner for home attach with Window Cleaning Tool can be used to clean shower walls and doors, kitchen countertops, glass cooktops, marble tables, windows, mirrors and glass. The handheld pressurized steam cleaner attach with Faric Steamer Tool can be used to clean curtain, disinfection(strain/pillow quilt), clothing and baby toys. Handheld pressurized steam cleaners for home use attach with Bent Nozzle can be used to clean shower walls and doors, glass and cooktops and kitchen countertops.

This steam cleaner handheld can fast heating within 3-5 Mins and Up to 230℉(115℃) MOSCHE steam cleaner for home is with 9.8ft power cord so it is handheld and portable that you can take it to clean anywhere you need very convenient. Steam cleaners for home use. The steam cleaners handheld can continuously emit pressurized temperature to 230℉(110°C) , and the steam comes out at a temperature 212℉-221℉(100-105°C). Steamer cleaner Handheld with11.8OZ(350ML) large water tank capacity. For better using experience, we recommend to add no more than 9.46OZ(280ML). Or it may spill when heating is processed. Steam cleaner comes with 11 pieces accessories The steam cleaner comes with 1x Funnel, 3x Nylon Brushes, 1x Bent Nozzle, 1x Measuring Cup, 1x Window Cleaning Tool, 1x Faric Steamer Tool, 1x Long Spray Nozzle, 1x Extension Hose, 1x Towel Sleeve
High-pressure handheld pressurized steam cleaner for home to clean your hard to reach areas.

Why can't the safety cap be opened if you want to add water again into the steam cleaners for home use? 1. Unplug First. 2. Fully discharge the residual steam or wait the steam cool down. 3. Open the lid and add water into the steam cleaner handheld. Why did the accessories parts fall off during cleaning after being stuck in? 1. Please let the alignment of accessories focus to the product bayonet. 2. Push in the accessories part you need to clean. 3. Twist it to the left side.（Contrarotate） 4. After, you can enjoy your steam cleaner with accessories fully twisted in. Why need to wait the water completely finish heating up before use. And why can not heat up always during using? It can spray steam, but it will be mixed with water when using if not completely finish heating. After a short time use, steam cleaner may not heat because the internal temperature is reach to 138 ℃, at this time the temp control will be protected. After attach the accessories and add water into the tank and heat up to use, steam cleaner is air leak, why this happen? In this case, please press the" ON/OFF" Button firstly, after pressing once, the air leak issue will disappear so it can be used. If you still have this situation after pressing, you can tell us and we will handle this. Does the steam cleaner not stressful enough when using? First of all, please check whether the safety cap is tight, if it is not tight, it may cause insufficient pressure. And we do not recommend customer using the steam cleaner without tightening or it may get hurt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get this steamer as I had watched other video reviews. When the steam cleaner arrived, I excitedly started to clean everything I could think of that needed steam cleaned. It is easy to operate and does really well steam cleaning. I was able to clean built up grime around sink faucets (couldn't get them clean before) and several other things (oven, toilets, etc), however after prolonged use, the steamer lost efficiency. It quit working as well as when I first started to clean things. About a month later, I used it again and it worked really well. I didn't clean near as many things as the first time I used it. I think I must've "overused" it the first time. Overall, I feel that it was worth the price I paid (used coupons) for it as it does well when not overdoing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty easy to use and does a good job with cleaning
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty nice steamer but I would say the down side is that there is no bag or anything to store the attachments and such. You can store all the necessary attachments inside the box I suppose but it is a bit annoying when you are trying to store this steam pressure cleaner. This steamer is relatively light when it is empty but can get pretty heavy when you add water to it. Is it extremely heavy? No I would say you still should be able to hold it with one hand with water in it. I When this device is filled up, I am able to steam clean pretty much anything but the carpet really. I have tried it between my tiles, car, and even my stove top. It provides a good small stream of steam to get all the tough grime out. It does not utilize too much water and the pressure is using hot steam so be aware of that. It does require external power to power this device. The attachments are nice so you can easily steam clean between tiles which is one of the hardest parts to get to. I also was able to clean between the crevasse of my bathtub and get the grim right out. There are several attachment that are easy to take on and off. There are thin head attachments for those hard to reach corners, there are thinner steamers for those window plates, and the traditional ones for hard wood floors and carpets. There is a gun trigger to release and deploy the steam so you do not have to always constantly have steam when you are trying to clean. You can use as much water as you want however much you want but again be careful because this is steam so it is hot. Another thing to note is that there is no way to clean up the water or suck it up so you need to clean it with a cloth after. Afterwards I would just throw the cloth in the wash after I am done. I have not seen any issues of the steamers dying out on me. Overall I think this steam is pretty nice. It is relatively easy to store and you can put this into any closet space. You have plenty of attachment for all your deep cleanings. You can use this on your bathroom, kitchen or even your car if you wanted to. The steam gun is easy to control. The one minor thing I would say is careful when carrying this full of water and to empty it when you are not using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I only have it 4 stars because it did not have the instructions in the box. I had to look it up on YouTube to make sure, but works great and fast heating. Used it on all my upholstery ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was delivered earlier today and I haven’t put it down since. My first impression was that it is very well made. I was a little disappointed in the size of the scrub head attachment. It comes with 3 so I was hoping they’d vary in sizes but they don’t. It is pretty lightweight so it’s not hard to carry it around and clean with it. The water lasts a lot longer than I expected which is good because once the water runs out you have to wait about 5-10 minutes for it to cool down before the machine allows you to open the lid to refill. I haven’t experienced any leaks from the machine itself but it is brand new. I do wish it had a longer power cord so I could use it without an extension cord. I was very surprised at how loud the steam was. It makes sense to me now because this little thing is super powerful. I have a heart condition so it’s really hard on my body to scrub things down. This takes the elbow work out of it. I can use one of the attachments on the area and wipe with a towel to remove access water and it’s clean! It really is that easy. It also has a way of making cleaning so fun . It’s so satisfying watching the dirt and grime melt away. I literally had to force myself to put it up for the night and relax. This thing has me cleaning things that I’ve been dreading cleaning willingly and easily. Baseboards and doors are no match for me anymore. I’m about to have the cleanest house on the block.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My niece cleans apartment rentals -
reviews.reviewText: I bought this originally for myself because of trying to find easier, faster but something that cleans and is less expensive and time consuming.The good part is that it steams windows, bathrooms, kitchen cabinets, draws, handles, knobs, countertops, inside ovens which are hard to clean .. but small tank for water so it doesn’t last long.Now, if you’re doing something where you don’t need to reach into higher or further distances, then it’s so simple to add water, plug in, give a few minutes to warm up and steam! Perfect size for handheld tool, heats up extremely fast, it’s very Safe and provides a selection of tools you can choose to use for certain areas your cleaningFor me work wise, I needed something bigger than that. I ordered one of the same type but for what I do cleaning apartments, i needed a bigger tank to hold water in with a long hose to attach floor steamer which is UNREAL!Comes with many different attachments for steam cleaning. The only thing is I love them both for these reasonsSMALLER HANDLE HELD- I dont have to lugged the big one around so it is a lot more beneficial for this one- it is handle held so you can get closer to the area as different attachments come with this (more than what the bigger one had)- fast warm up time and less space for carrying and still can clean windows amazingly and fast

Super easy to use. Got it to work in a few minutes, very lightweight. Love it. Bought it to clean my parrot's cage. Does the job of removing the poop from hard to reach places. Many different adaptors, even one to clean windows, will most likely try this out.

Me llegó un modelo diferente al de la publicación, el vapor no es caliente como pensaba, para una mejor limpieza, al ser mi primer limpiador a vapor desconozco si todos funcionan igual, pero espera más. Si ha contribuido a mejorar y optimizar la limpieza sobre todo en aquellos lugares de difícil acceso.
the bottle should be clear to see level of water - pressing button is cheaply made not comfortable holding.
Calienta muy pronto,capacidad de agua muy chica,hay que recargar muy seguido.

reviews.reviewTitle: PELIGRO! No se quemen las manos!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. El vapor sale por una conexión en el tubo. Me quemé la mano al primero uso. Podría haber sido muy grave. Pésimo producto y Amazon no debería dejar que se vende en su plataforma.
